text:
Have you seen how gadgets are assembled on an assembly line? It's people sitting at a table all long day working with their hands. 
How about doing this work with a stationary robots with two arms and a camera?
Trying to do this at @_nightsweekends @_buildspace https://t.co/ZSVOnB2Wk1
